name: 黃士嘉
objective:
Computer organization and design course consists of the following topics:
1.Computer Abstractions and Technology
2.Instructions: Language of the Computer
3.Arithmetic for Computers
4.The Processor
5.Large and Fast: Exploiting Memory Hierarch
6.Storage and Other I/O Topics
7.Multicores, Multiprocessors, and Clusters
schedule:
1.Computer Abstractions and Technology (2 weeks)
2.Instructions: Language of the Computer (2 weeks)
3.Arithmetic for Computers (3 weeks)
4.The Processor (3 weeks)
5.Large and Fast: Exploiting Memory Hierarch (2 weeks)
6.Storage and Other I/O Topics (2 weeks)
7.Multicores, Multiprocessors, and Clusters (2 weeks)
materials:
Computer Organization and Design: The Hardware/Software Interface, 4rd
http://www.cc.ntut.edu.tw/~schuang/CO/CO.htm
